duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for building and leading a team to deliver technology products and services that meet business outcomes.
Ensures people development through coaching, mentoring, feedback, and hands-on career development.
Develops a technology strategy and ensures technology solutions comply with applicable standards.
Advocates and advances modern, Agile solution delivery practices and evangelizes great design, engineering, and organizational practices.
Manages relationships with the business and technology leaders, and vendors for technical products.
Leads and creates followership in Communities of Practice in the organization.
Directs the physical and logical engineering deliverables, workflow, and priorities for Global Networks.
Understands the dynamics of risk vs. speed vs. quality and how these choices impact costs/finances and commitments.
Interfaces directly with internal and external customers, network architecture and engineering, deployment and product/service management, operations, vendors, consultants, and contractors.
Solves problems, makes key decisions, and represents the strategic vision and goals of the organization to various stakeholders and shareholders.
Participates in exceptions or new standard reviews and directs the installation of all work.
Works globally in a federated model with regional execution.
Understands how to schedule large, multi-technology projects for deployment and how to leverage projects, change windows, and initiatives to create long-term strategic value.
Critical in the technology delivery lifecycle across networks, the entire infrastructure group, and lines of business initiatives.

Participates in major IT projects, design and deployment, and has strong skills in Scripting, Scripting (Python, Ansible, PowerShell), ITIL, SDN (ACI/NSX, Arista CloudVision), SD-WAN, Automation Skills (Expect, Rancid, REST/SOAP), and various equipment manufacturers including CISCO, Juniper, Arista, Brocade, EMC, HP/Aruba, etc.
Solves problems, makes key decisions, and represents the strategic vision and goals of the organization to various stakeholders and shareholders.
